trivia_items.text: Mountain is one of the six Operators teased at the end of the CN server's 1st anniversary livestream. The others are Archetto, Surtr, Saga, Thorns, and Goldenglow.
Mountain has the traits of a tiger (Panthera tigris) similar with Broca, Indra, Swire and Waai Fu. Specifically, he is based on a white tiger.

Mountain is one of the few characters in Arknights whose years of fighting experience is not labeled as "Combat Experience" in their Archive files. In his case, it is labeled as "Prison Brawling Experience" instead.
Mountain is currently the tallest Operator in the game at a height of 195 cm, overtaking Hellagur's 193 cm.
